create.content: {proposer} just sent you a Proposal. Go check it with {command.proposals}.

proposal_already_exists.content: You already have a pending proposal with {proposee} {emoji.error}.

proposal_self.content: You cannot send a proposal to yourself {emoji.laugh}.

proposal_bot.content: You can't send a proposal to a bot {emoji.laugh}.

none_found.content: It doesn't look like there are any proposals with you involved {emoji.sad}.

embed.description:
## {emoji.heart} Proposal Manager {emoji.heart}
Welcome to the **Proposal Manager** :wave:!
The Proposal Manager is where you can come to see all your Proposals, and not just marriage proposals.
## Proposal Status' :bar_chart:
These are the different status' that a Proposal can be.
- **Pending :yellow_circle:** - The Proposal is still pending a response.
- **Approved :green_circle:** - The Proposal has been approved by the proposee.
- **Denied :red_circle:** - The Proposal was denied by the proposee.
## Proposal Types :ring: 
Not all proposals are for marriage in the Unionize bot. Proposals can be for:
- `Adoption`
- `Parenting`
- `Marriage`

insight_nonexistent.content: That insight doesn't seem to exist anymore {emoji.sad}.

no_tree.content: You currently don't have a family tree {emoji.sad}. Maybe marry someone with {command.marry}.

no_proposal.content: Hmmm... that proposal doesn't exits anymore {emoji.error}.

already_denied.content: That proposal has already been denied {emoji.error}.

already_accepted.content: That proposal has already been accepted {emoji.success}.

fail.content: This command only works in a server {emoji.error}.
Hey, I just restart and am not ready to be used yet {emoji.sad}. Please retry this command in a sec {emoji.happy}.
